text: Anthology is a 1998 compilation album by Deborah Allen, distributed by Renaissance Records, Franklin, TN. Tracks 1 to 3 are overdubs with original Jim Reeves tracks to create duets. Steve Huey of AllMusic wrote that Jim Reeves' widow handpicked Allen to dub onto the three unfinished Reeves tracks.Huey, Steve. "Biography", AllMusic ==Track listing== *Track information and credits taken from the album's liner notes. ==References== ==External links== *Deborah Allen Official Site Category:1998 albums Category:Deborah Allen albums Category:Curb Records albums
title: Anthology (Deborah Allen album)
